name: abap2ui5
description: Developing UI5 Apps purely in ABAP.

scripts.syfixes: find . -type f -name '*.abap' -exec sed -i -e 's/ RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE cx_sy_itab_line_not_found/ ASSERT 1 = 0/g' {} +
scripts.downport: rm -rf downport && cp -r src downport && abaplint --fix abaplint-downport.jsonc && npm run syfixes
scripts.test: npm run downport && npm run transpile && npm run unit
scripts.rename: abaplint abaplint_rename.json --rename && rm -rf src/ui5/* && cp -r output/src/** src/
scripts.mirror: npm run cleanup && rm -rf src/* && rm -rf output && npm run rename && npm run cleanup
scripts.mirror2: abaplint abaplint_rename.json --rename && rm -rf src/ui5/* && cp -r src/** src/
